desc: Plaeto - Shoes for growing feet. Designed by a world class team of footwear experts from India, USA and Italy. We make shoes, scientifically designed for Indian children for both school and after school play. Perfect for all kinds of play, mischief and adventures.

layout.text:
Designed by the world.
For Indian feet.
Crafted by a team of designers and engineers from India, USA, and Italy after studying hundreds of Indian feet.
